name: 灯織
text:
うさぎさんが自転車に乗っていると、
携帯に電話がかかってきました……
trans:
Rabbit was riding his bicycle,
when his phone rang...

name: 灯織
text:
『もしもし』……うさぎさんは電話を取ります
『やぁ、カメさん久しぶり』
trans:
"Hello?"... Rabbit picked up his phone.
"Hey Turtle, it's been a while."

name: 灯織
text:
カメさんと話すのが楽しく、うさぎさんは
自転車に乗ったまま、夢中でお話を続けていました
trans:
Chatting with Turtle was so much fun, Rabbit
kept talking to him while riding his bicycle.

name: 灯織
text:
すると──
『キキーッ！　ドンッ！』
trans:
When suddenly──
"Screeeechー! Crash!"

name: 灯織
text:
角を曲がってくる相手に気付かず、
うさぎさんは自転車でぶつかってしまったのです……
trans:
Not noticing that someone was turning a corner,
Rabbit crashed into him with his bicycle...

name: 灯織
text:
『だ、大丈夫ですか！』そばへ寄ってみると、
倒れて大ケガをしていたのは、なんとカメさんでした
trans:
"A-Are you alright!?" Rabbit rushed over to his side,
and saw none other than Turtle there, lying hurt on 
the ground.

name: 灯織
text:
『カメさん！　カメさん！
……ああ、電話なんてしなければよかった……！』
trans:
"Turtle! Turtle!
... Ooh, I should've never picked up that phone... !"

name: 灯織
text:
うさぎさんはわんわんと泣きながら、
すぐに救急車を呼ぶのでした……
trans: Rabbit wept aloud as he called an ambulance...

name: 灯織
text:
……みなさんはどうですか？
電話やよそ見をしながら運転するのはとても危険です
trans:
... What do you think of the story?
It's very dangerous to use your phone while you're 
riding a bicycle.

name: 灯織
text:
十分に注意して、自転車に乗りましょう
……おしまい
trans:
Let's be extra careful when we ride our bikes.
... The end.

name: 灯織
text:
ど、どう……？
気になるところは遠慮せずに、教えてほしい……！
trans:
H-How was it... ?
If there's anything I should improve on, please just
let me know... !

name: めぐる
text:
うーん……
灯織、怖い雰囲気はよく出てるんだけど……
trans:
Hmmm... 
Hiori, you did a great job at making the story sound
scary, but...

name: めぐる
text: 怖すぎるよー……！
trans: It was way too scary... !

name: 灯織
text: そんなに、ダメかな……
trans: Was it, really that bad... ?

name: めぐる
text: ううん、そうじゃなくて！
trans: No, that's not it!

name: めぐる
text:
事故って嫌なものなんだってわかってもらわなきゃだから、
怖いのも必要だと思う
trans:
It's important to make the point that road accidents
are terrible, so I think you still need to make it a little 
bit scary.

name: めぐる
text: でも小さい子たちもいるから、たとえば……
trans: But there'll be little kids there too, so maybe...

name: めぐる
text:
うさぎさんが後悔するところまでは今みたいに読んで、
その後──
trans:
You can keep reading the way you did up until when
Rabbit regrets his actions, and after that──

name: めぐる
text:
──みんな、どうだったかなー？
うさぎさん、どんな気持ちだったと思う？
trans:
──Hey everyone, what do you think?
How did Rabbit feel after that?

name: 灯織
text:
……と、友だちにケガをさせて、
とってもつらい思いをしてると思う……
trans:
... H-He hurt his friend,
so he must've felt really bad...

name: めぐる
text: うん、そうだよね
trans: Yeah, I think you're right.

name: めぐる
text:
じゃあ、事故を起こさないためには、
うさぎさんはどうしていればよかったのかな？
trans:
Then, what should Rabbit have done so that
an accident like this doesn't happen?

name: 灯織
text:
それは……運転しながら電話をしちゃダメだったし、
するなら自転車を降りるべきだった……
trans:
Let's see... He shouldn't have used his phone when 
he's riding his bike, and if he had to pick up he 
should've gotten off his bike...

name: めぐる
text:
そう！　ちゃんと自転車を降りて、
どこかで止まって電話をすればよかったんだよね！
trans:
That's right! He should've gotten off his bike,
and stopped somewhere to pick up the call!

name: めぐる
text:
──これは、みんなも一緒です！
自転車に乗ったままの電話も、よそ見も、すっごく危ないの
trans:
──And that goes for everyone too!
When you're riding a bike, making a call, or looking
away from the road, is really dangerous.

name: めぐる
text:
だから、そういうことをするのはやめようね
みんなと、お姉さんとの約束！
trans:
So that's why we shouldn't do these things anymore.
Let's make a promise together!

name: 灯織
text: は、はい！
trans: Y-Yes!

name: 灯織
text:
……！
……めぐる、すごい……！
trans:
..... !
... Meguru, you were great... !

name: めぐる
text: えへへっ、じゃあ次は灯織も！
trans: Ehehe, it's your turn next, Hiori!

name: 灯織
text: え？
trans: Huh?

name: めぐる
text:
一緒にやってみようよ！
──『みんな、どうだったかなー？』
trans:
Let's do it together!
──"Hey everyone, what do you think?"

name: 灯織
text: ……『み、みんなー……どうだったかなー？』
trans: ──"H-Hey everyone... what do you think... ?"

name: めぐる
text: 『みんなも、よそ見はやめようね！』
trans: "Let's keep our eyes on the road, okay!"

name: 灯織
text: 『みんなも、よそ見はやめようね……！』
trans: "Let's keep our eyes on the road... okay... !"

name: めぐる
text: ふふっ
trans: Hehe!

name: 灯織
text: ど、どう……？
trans: H-How was that... ?

name: めぐる
trans: ──90 points!

name: 灯織
text: えっ……！
trans: Wha... !

name: めぐる
text:
今日は90点
だから──明日は100点を目指しましょう！
trans:
You get 90 points for today.
So──let's aim for 100 points tomorrow!

name: 灯織
text: あ、明日？
trans: T-Tomorrow?

name: めぐる
text:
そう！　これから本番まで、毎日練習するの
どうかな？
trans:
Yup! We'll practice every day, until the big day!
What do you think?

name: 灯織
text: めぐる……
trans: Meguru...

name: 灯織
text: ……いいの？
trans: ... Is it okay with you?

name: めぐる
text:
もっちろん！
えへへ、『約束だよーっ？』
trans:
Of course!
Ehehe, ”It's a promise, okay?"

name: 灯織
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah... !

name: 灯織
text: や、『約束、だよ……！』
trans: "I-It's a promise, okay... !"

name: 灯織
text: めぐる、めぐるっ──！
trans: Meguru, Meguruuu!

name: めぐる
trans:
──?
... Ah, Hioriii!

name: 灯織
text:
はぁ……はぁ……
それ……傘はダメ……！
trans:
Haa... Haa... 
That... umbrella, don't use it... !

name: めぐる
text: えっ？
trans: Huh?

name: 灯織
text:
それ……折り畳み傘……
自転車に乗りながら使ったら……危ないから──
trans:
That folding umbrella... you have there...
It's dangerous to use it... while riding your bicycle──

name: めぐる
text: あっ、これ？
trans: Ah, this?

name: 灯織
text: うん……
trans: Yeah...

name: めぐる
text:
えへへっ、出る時に『降るよ』って渡されて……
持ったまま来ちゃった
trans:
Ehehe, my parents said it'll rain and made me take
it when I was on the way out... I just brought it along.

name: めぐる
text:
さっきぽつって来てたけど、
乗ってるときは差さないよっ
trans:
It was drizzling a little just now,
but I wouldn't open it while I'm on my bike!

name: 灯織
text: そ、そっか……
trans: I-I see...

name: 灯織
text:
……ごめん
私、勘違いして……
trans:
... Sorry.
I jumped to my own conclusions...

name: めぐる
text:
ううん！　心配して、注意してくれたんだもん
ありがとう、灯織
trans:
Don't be! I mean, you warned me because you were 
just looking out for me. Thanks, Hiori.

name: めぐる
text:
それに──普段からこういうことに気付けるのって、
すごいことだよ！
trans:
Besides── It's really cool that you're watching out 
for stuff like that in your daily life too!

name: 灯織
text: す、すごいとかじゃ……！
trans: I-It's nothing cool like that... !

name: 灯織
text:
……紙芝居を読んでる人が、
嘘つくわけにはいかないから
trans:
... I just think that as a storyteller,
I shouldn't be lying to people.

name: めぐる
trans: Huh... ?

name: 灯織
text:
……その……交通安全の紙芝居を読んでるのに、
自分がちゃんとルールを守ってなかったら
trans:
... I mean... Even if I tell a story about traffic safety,
unless I myself follow the rules properly...

name: 灯織
text:
子どもたちにも、みんなにも、
絶対に、守ってなんかもらえない……
trans:
The children, and everyone else, 
would definitely not obey those rules either...

name: めぐる
text: 灯織……
trans: Hiori...

name: 灯織
text:
……急にごめん
一日警察署長……ちょっと緊張してて
trans:
... Sorry about going off so suddenly.
I'm a little nervous... about being Police Chief for
a day.

name: 灯織
text: 警察官の人たちは、24時間、警察官で……
trans:
The people in the police force, need to be police
officers, 24 hours a day...

name: 灯織
text:
いつでも子どもたちに見られてるし、
見られてるって思って、行動しなきゃいけないんだと思う
trans:
They'll be seen by children at any time,
so I think they need to act under the assumption
that they're being watched all the time.

name: 灯織
text:
……だから、私
そんな役、務めてもいいのかなって、不安で……
trans:
... That's why, I don't know,
if I can really step up to this role, and I'm worried...

name: めぐる
text: ……そっか
trans: ... I see.

name: めぐる
text: ──……えへへっ、灯織、100点！
trans: ──... Ehehe, Hiori, you get 100 points!

name: 灯織
text:
え……？
今日の練習、まだだけど……
trans:
Huh... ?
But we haven't started our practice today...

name: めぐる
text: ううんっ、灯織はもう十分、とってもいい警察官だよ！
trans:
Nope, but right now, you're already a fantastic police
officer, Hiori!

name: めぐる
text:
だから、今日も明日も、ずーっと100点！
絶対いい署長さんになれるよ！
trans:
So that's why, you'll keep scoring 100 points, both
today and tomorrow too!
You'll definitely be an awesome Police Chief!

name: 灯織
text: めぐる……
trans: Meguru...

name: めぐる
text: あ。でもでも、笑顔はまだ宿題だけどねー？
trans:
Ah. But, but, you've still got to work on that smile,
alright?

name: 灯織
text: ……うん
trans: ... Yeah.

name: 灯織
text: ……ありがとう、めぐる
trans: ... Thanks, Meguru.

name: 灯織
text:
うん……。少なくとも私自身は、
できるようにって、思ってなきゃ
trans:
Alright… Then at the very least,
I myself need to believe that I can do it.

name: めぐる
text: うん！　絶対、できるよ！
trans: Yeah! You definitely can!

name: 灯織
text:
……それじゃ──
傘、貸して
trans:
... Well then──
Lend me your umbrella.

name: めぐる
text: ……えっ？
trans: ... Huh?

name: 灯織
text:
またぽつって、きたから
私が持つ
trans:
It started drizzling again.
I'll hold it up.

name: めぐる
text: 灯織……
trans: Hiori...

name: 灯織
text: めぐるは降りて、自転車を押して
trans: Meguru, you get off the bike and push it forward.

name: めぐる
text: ──えへへっ、はーい！
trans: ──Ehehe, okaaaay!

name: プロデューサー
text: おお、みんな立派な警察官だな
trans: Ooh, you all look like fine police officers.

name: めぐる
text:
ほんとー！？
んー、じゃあ、なんにしよっかなぁ
trans:
Really!?
Hmm, then, what should we do...

name: 灯織
text: 何って、何が……？
trans: What should we do, about what... ?

name: めぐる
text:
灯織は署長でしょ？
真乃とわたしはどうしよっかなって！
trans:
Hiori‘s the Chief, right?
So I was thinking what Mano and I should be!

name: めぐる
text: えっと──真乃巡査！　……うーん、櫻木巡査？
trans: Uhh, Officer Mano! ... Or maybe, Officer Sakuragi?

name: プロデューサー
text: 苗字の方が強そうな感じはするな
trans: I think using her last name makes her sound tougher.

name: めぐる
text: じゃあ灯織も風野署長にしとく！？
trans: Then should we call Hiori, Chief Kazano, too!?

name: 灯織
text: どっちでもいいよ
trans: Anything's fine.

name: めぐる
text: 真乃はどっちがいい？
trans: Mano, which one do you like?
